attributes.action: Are you fed up with schools constantly asking for money?
attributes.additional_details:
Are you a parent or carer?
Are you fed up of constant letters from schools demanding money for this, that and the other?
Do schools need to go to theme parks, how does a theme park provide an education?
Do schools need expensive skiing trips?
Are you fed up of schools favouring trips and strikes over educating your child?
This is your chance to be heard, time to start saying no to strikes, no to endless requests for money, sign the petition, lets make ourselves heard
